hero.title: Tailored to Your Vision
hero.description: At the forefront of technology trends, delivering intelligent systems that leverage the latest AI advancements to automate processes, generate creative content, and provide personalized experiences.

about.title: Our services
about.subtitle: Frontend Developer
about.p1: I am Guo Shengyuan, a frontend developer currently pursuing a Master's degree in Information Technology at the University of Auckland. I have a solid educational background in computer science and practical software development experience.
about.p2: In my career, I have focused on the React ecosystem, developing various responsive web applications. I am familiar with modern frontend development tools and technologies, including React, Redux, Tailwind CSS, etc. I also have full-stack development capabilities, understanding backend technologies such as Node.js and Express.
about.p3: I am passionate about technology, especially in the fields of frontend development and artificial intelligence. Currently, I am looking for a frontend development position that can utilize my technical expertise, while constantly learning and growing.
about.techstack.desc: At the forefront of global technology trends, we deliver cutting-edge intelligent systems powered by the latest advancements in artificial intelligence. From automating complex workflows and generating high-quality creative content, to providing hyper-personalized customer experiences, our AI solutions are designed to help businesses reduce costs, increase efficiency, and gain a competitive edge. We integrate machine learning, natural language processing, and computer vision technologies to ensure your operations are not only smart, but also adaptive to future challenges.
about.education.desc: We design and implement custom automation tools that transform traditional operations into fully digital, streamlined workflows. Our solutions eliminate repetitive manual tasks, improve accuracy, and significantly boost productivity across all business functions. By integrating APIs, robotic process automation (RPA), and real-time monitoring, we ensure your systems run faster, smarter, and with minimal human intervention—allowing your team to focus on high-value strategic work.
about.projects.desc: We build tailor-made professional software solutions and websites designed for diverse industries and business models. From responsive user interfaces to secure backend architectures, our development process ensures optimal performance, scalability, and user experience. We employ the latest web technologies—such as React, Next.js, and secure cloud deployments—to deliver solutions that are visually appealing, highly functional, and future-proof.
about.Digital strategy & advisory.desc: Our digital strategy and advisory services provide you with a clear roadmap for leveraging technology to achieve your business goals. We conduct in-depth system audits, identify security vulnerabilities, and recommend tailored digital transformation plans. Whether it’s optimizing your IT infrastructure, enhancing cybersecurity measures, or implementing advanced analytics, we ensure your organization is equipped for sustainable growth in the digital era.

job1.desc1: Over 10 years of experience in software engineering and DevOps, with a strong background in large-scale system architecture and automation.
job1.desc2: Previously held roles at Baidu and Tencent, specializing in backend, and infrastructure optimization for high-performance platforms.

job2.desc1: Specialist in microservices, high-concurrency design, and full-stack development.
job2.desc2: Capable of delivering scalable, high-performance solutions tailored to diverse business needs.
job2.desc3: Possesses long-term industry experience in computer vision.

job3.desc1: Master's degree in Artificial Intelligence, with deep expertise in machine learning models, data analysis, large language models, and natural language processing.
job3.desc2: Currently serving as an AI developer at the largest engineering consultancy company in the Asia-Pacific region.
job3.desc3: Delivering AI-driven solutions to enhance operational efficiency and decision-making.

job4.desc1: Experienced in website design, cloud infrastructure, and API development.
job4.desc2: Track record of delivering multiple responsive, high-traffic websites.
job4.desc3: AWS-certified and skilled in secure, scalable deployments.

list.title: Get in Touch
list.desc: Share your requirements with our friendly team to understand your goals, challenges, and desired outcomes.

list.title: Planning
list.desc: Define the scope, milestones, and deliverables for the phase, ensuring alignment with long-term objectives.

list.title: Development
list.desc: Implement phase features through agile, iterative methods for flexibility and ongoing enhancement.

list.title: Deliver
list.desc: Deploy phase deliverables into production, collect feedback, and progress to the next stage.

list.title: Support
list.desc: Provide ongoing maintenance, updates, and enhancements to keep the solution optimized, secure, and ready to meet evolving business needs.

education.title: Education Background
education.desc1: Currently pursuing a Master's degree in Information Technology at the University of Auckland, focusing on advanced software development and web application development technologies.
education.desc2: Completed a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science at the University of Auckland, studying fundamental theories and practical skills in computer science.
education.achievement1: Musichat project won the Best Student Project Award at the University of Auckland in 2024
education.achievement2: The MediMate system I contributed to was recognized in the Medical Health Technology Innovation Competition
